name: part_009
file: tmp_【重大発表あり!!!】宝鐘マリン生誕祭 3D LIVE！豪華ゲスト＆新曲お披露目！【ホロライブ⧸宝鐘マリン】 [NxtHvRVLzXM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song "Butter-Fly" by a group of Hololive members.
Special announcement PV for Houshou Marine's new song and 1st album.
Performance of the new song "Dead Ma'am's Chest".

subtitles.original: 踏んでるヒットソング聴きながら
subtitles.english: While listening to the hit songs we're stepping to

subtitles.original: 何が WOW WOW WOW WOW WOW この街に響くのだろう
subtitles.english: What will "wow wow" through this city?

subtitles.original: だけど WOW WOW WOW WOW WOW 期待してても仕方ない
subtitles.english: But "wow wow", it's no use having expectations.

subtitles.original: 無限大な夢のあとの 何もない世の中じゃ
subtitles.english: In this empty world after an infinite dream,

subtitles.original: そうさ常識 はずれも悪くはないかな
subtitles.english: Yeah, maybe being unconventional isn't so bad.

subtitles.original: Stayしそうなイメージを染めた
subtitles.english: Dyed with an image that seems to stay,

subtitles.original: ぎこちない翼でも
subtitles.english: even with these awkward wings.

subtitles.original: きっと飛べるさ On my love
subtitles.english: I'm sure I can fly, on my love.

subtitles.english: In this empty world after an infinite dream,

subtitles.english: Yeah, even my precious feelings seem like they'll lose,

subtitles.english: full of images that tend to stay,

subtitles.original: 頼りない翼でも
subtitles.english: even with these unreliable wings.

subtitles.original: きっと飛べるさ Oh yeah~
subtitles.english: I'm sure I can fly, oh yeah~

subtitles.english: In this miserable world after an infinite dream,

subtitles.original: そうさ常識 はずれも悪くはないかな
subtitles.english: Yeah, maybe being unconventional isn't so bad.

subtitles.english: even with these awkward wings.
